mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO tb_quotation_stock_base ( wind_code, trade_date, open_price, high_price, low_price, volume, amount, close_price, turnover_rate ) VALUES
( #{item.windCode}, #{item.tradeDate}, #{item.openPrice}, #{item.highPrice}, #{item.lowPrice}, #{item.volume}, #{item.amount}, #{item.closePrice}, #{item.turnoverRate} )
